resources.string: Shashanka Salon and Spa has evolved to be the best destination for hair, skin, and beauty services. We offer a variety of services that includes hair, skin, spa facials and bridal makeup and we are known for our exceptional hair cuts, hair styles, facials , bridal makeups and many more. We are equipped with a good ambiance, accord music and modern salon and spa amenities to provide a diverse range of bridal services. At shashanka, we are committed to ensure that each time you visit our beauty parlor we will exceed your expectations in Customer service, Professionalism, and Quality and Consistency of services. Our staff is continually trained with the latest styles, techniques and products. A primary component of our success has been the courteous and intuitive service provided by our team. We offer our expert consultations as a complementary. Advice and recommendations are tailored to each clientâ€™s image, style, and persona.
